page.title: 18SCHOOL/VILLAGE SPORTS
page.content: {THE FAMILY SPORTS EVENING}IS A VERY POPULAR ANNUAL EVENT IN THE LIFE OF WHITTONSTALL SCHOOL.WHOLE FAMILIES PARTICIPATE IN THE RACES FOOTBALL AND ROUNDERS GAMES.ONE OF THE BEST PARTS OF THE EVENING IS THE TUG OF WAR WHEN A WHITTONSTALL TEAM OF STRONG MEN COMPETES AGAINST A SIMILAR TEAM FROM THE NEXT PARISH WHOSE CHILDREN ALSO ATTEND THE SCHOOL.RACES RUN INCLUDE RUNNING,EGG AND SPOON,THREE-LEGGED,RELAY,SKIPPING AND OBSTACLE.PRIZES OF LOLLY-POPS ARE AWARDED AND THE EVENING IS VERY RELAXED AND HAPPY.WHEN ALL THE SPORTS ARE OVER LIGHT REFRESHMENTS ARE SERVED OR, SOMETIMES THERE IS A BARBEQUE OF SAUSAGE BEEFBURGERS BAKED POTATOESAND A SELECTION OF SALADS.
